title: Can META Stock Bounce Back After Its Latest Tumble?
text: In a busy week of big tech earnings, investors turned their attention to Meta Platforms (META) and its dreadful Q3 earnings report. META has now tumbled 72% from its highs after the post-earnings decline this week and its lowest levels since 2016.

title: Making Sense of Big Tech Earnings After Amazon and Meta Tumble
text: The earnings bombshells from Amazon and Meta and sub-par releases from Alphabet and Microsoft have forced us all to revisit our long-held assumptions about the sustainability of these technology leaders' earnings power

title: Chinese Stocks Look Cheap. But Bargain Hunters Risk Losing Everything.
text: Bulls on Chinese stocks say that, at these prices, U.S. investors are being compensated for the risks. But if you think you can trust Xi Jinping, think again.

title: Amazon's (AMZN) Q3 Earnings Fall Y/Y, Sales Miss Estimates
text: Amazon's (AMZN) third-quarter results reflect strength in AWS, Prime and third-party sellers. However, its weak fourth-quarter guidance remains a concern.

title: Big Tech falters on dreary earnings and forecasts for Q4— Meta has worst week ever, Amazon tumbles 13%
text: While Apple gave Wall Street a reason to cheer, the other Big Tech companies showed how challenging the economic environment has become for their businesses.

title: Apple, Amazon and Meta results cap off a wild week in Big Cap stories
text: US stocks were reeling this week from a batch of disappointing earnings from the big tech sector, underscored by Amazon's warning of tougher times ahead. “An ugly week of Big Tech earnings is coming to an end, having wiped out hopes of seeing earnings boost gains across the stock markets,” said Ipek Ozkardeskaya, senior analyst at Swissquote Bank.

title: A $3 trillion loss: Big Tech's horrible year is getting worse
text: Big Tech companies are taking a heavy beating this week, to the tune of more than $255 billion in lost market capitalization that's helped make a bad year even worse for the once-beloved sector.

title: 46% Below Peak, Amazon Stock Will Fall On Sputtering Growth
text: Amazon stock is likely to keep falling until the economy gets more robust — that is not likely until 2024 at the earliest.

title: What Is Happening in the Cloud?
text: This is turning out to be one of the worst quarters for technology companies in a long time. Most are missing estimates on multiple fronts, or managing to beat lowered expectations. One area that deserves special focus just because it has been so strong of late is the cloud.

title: Are Amazon and Apple still a Buy after disappointing earnings?
text: Are Amazon and Apple still a Buy after disappointing earnings? Analysts at Canaccord Genuity (TSX:CF, LSE:CF) think so.

title: $4.7 Trillion Gone! Has Megacap Tech Peaked?
text: Megacap tech stocks used to be big S&P 500 winners. Now they're making losses like investors have never seen: $4.7 trillion.

title: Despite Inflationary Pricing Customers Continue To Spend, Amazon Sales Up 15%
text: Amazon's third-quarter results showed an increase in sales despite the current economic environment of high inflationary pricing. Consumers are looking for value, convenience with a focus on pricing this holiday season.

title: Why is Amazon Stock Falling? Is the Sell-Off Overdone?

text: Direxion Daily AMZN Bear 1X Shares (NYSE: AMZD) gapped up over 11% on Friday after a big bullish day on Thursday caused the ETF to rally 4%.

title: Amazon Stock Hits Over 2-Year Low After Earnings
text: Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) stock is weighing on the broader market  today, down 10.3% at $99.59 at last glance, and earlier as low as $97.66, after the company's third-quarter results missed estimates.

title: Why Amazon Stock Is Getting Crushed Today
text: Fourth-quarter guidance badly missed the mark.

title: Amazon (AMZN) Stock Is Plunging. What Comes Next?
text: Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN ) stock is trending on social media and sinking in early trading today after the e-commerce giant disappointed Wall Street with lackluster fourth-quarter guidance. As of this writing, shares are dropping by roughly 10%.

title: 'Safe port in the storm:' Why investors rewarded Apple but fled its Big Tech peers after earnings
text: Apple's performance during earnings this past week got a drastically different reaction from investors than its Big Tech peers Amazon, Google and Facebook.

title: Buying The Dip In Amazon Could Be A Mistake In The Near Term
text: Amazon.com's growth is slowing and is expected to continue to be weak in the near term. AWS growth is also slowing due to the market conditions and competition.

title: 'The recession may be here already': Amazon sees $120 billion in market value wiped out after mixed 3rd-quarter earnings, but Wall Street isn't turning bearish yet
text: "We still see $69 billion of future profit potential from AWS, advertising and 3rd-Party services that Amazon can unlock over the next 3 years."

title: Amazon stock tumbles after downbeat sales forecast
text: Amazon gave weak guidance for the fourth quarter, and its third-quarter results fell short of expectations.

title: How AMC Stock Could Fall 85% From Here
text: Meme stocks AMC Theaters (NYSE: AMC ) and Gamestop (NYSE: GME ) remain popular topics of discussion, if not popular holdings. AMC is now down 75% on the year, as CEO Adam Aron has continued issuing new stock.

title: Workers at NYC Starbucks and Amazon Go store file petition to unionize
text: Workers at the Starbucks and Amazon Go store in midtown Manhattan filed a petition for a union election on Friday.

title: Is Amazon stock in lasting trouble or will investors pick up a pre-Christmas bargain
text: Some days investing and analysing the markets is complex and fraught with confusion. On other days you're presented with the chance to buy shares in the world's largest retailer at a 20% discount imminently before the busiest and most lucrative shopping weeks of the year.

title: Amazon Stock is Crashing After Earnings: Buy the Dip or Stay Away?

title: Amazon Says Profits Could Disappear And Apple Facing ‘Significant' Headwinds In Q4
text: Because this is a Foundation Kit, investors can also choose to add Portfolio Protection.

title: Amazon slumps as tech selloff worsens
text: Amazon.com Inc's shares tumbled about 13% in premarket trading, with the online retailer coming close to losing its spot in the trillion-dollar company club, after forecasting holiday-quarter sales below Wall Street estimates.

title: Amazon market cap sinking $135 billion, set to fall below $1 trillion for first time in 2 1/2 years
text: The plunge in Amazon.com Inc.'s stock AMZN, -4.06% following a disappointing third-quarter earnings report and outlook puts the ecommerce giant on track to lose its place as a trillion-dollar company for the first time in 2 1/2 years. The stock dropped 12.0% in premarket trading, and is heading for the first trade below the $100 level during regular-session hours since April 7, 2020.

title: Italian court suspends decision on Amazon's record fine appeal
text: An Italian court has suspended a decision on a request by e-commerce giant Amazon to annul a record 1.13 billion euro ($1.12 billion) fine imposed by Italy's antitrust watchdog for alleged abuse of market dominance, a court ruling showed on Friday.

title: More Likely to 5x First: Tesla vs. Amazon
text: Both these stocks have put up great returns for shareholders. But what does the future look like?

title: ‘Pretty much Google 2.0' — Amazon price targets reduced by analysts, though they say the long-term story is intact
text: Analysts downgraded their price targets for Amazon.com after it reported missing its third quarter sales expectations alongside a weak sales forecast for the upcoming festive season.

title: Amazon posts weaker-than-expected 3Q revenue, stock tumbles
text: Amazon returned to profitability over the summer after two consecutive quarters of losses, but its stock fell sharply in after-hours trading due to weaker-than-expected revenue and disappointing projections for the current quarter.
